body: this is in english  already, hope it gets here soon

Very nice but I still prefer just futa on male sex in this story

piriringi is pretty nice to his characters usually, they are usually really lovey dovey/even works like this tend to err on romantic side, which is why last chapter was kind of a shock. Although I have to admit, I am pretty nervous, shes being way too nice too him, but she avoided that kiss, and after what happened to the other guy, I am wondering if we are setting up for a dark chapter/ending. This girl is supposed to be the worse of the two (from previous stated chapters) and now I'm wondering if she sets him up for a big fall
If this ends with an ntr I'l fly to Japan & Hurt him with my left foot.
woo hoo, she gave her vagina to him, good on him ^_^
YAY! I can't wait for this, especially after the last part. I seriously hoped that she liked him, so wanna know whats going on with these two. I hope this works out to a happy ending for everyone
